declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) Declare @vchFullSQL varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
/****** Object: View [dbo].[vw_DimDate] Script Date: 09/19/2012 17:29:31 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[vw_DimDate]'')) DROP VIEW [dbo].[vw_DimDate] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL = ' /****** Object: View [dbo].[vw_DimDate] Script Date: 09/19/2012 17:12:34 ******/ CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vw_DimDate] AS
SELECT D.DimDateID , D.FullDate , D.DateName , D.MonthName , D.CalendarYear , D.CalendarYearMonth , D.Lineage_ID , D.DateCreated , ''''Not Applicable'''' as DisplayCalendarYear , ''''Not Applicable'''' as DisplayCalendarMonth FROM DAL_SEC.dbo.tblDimDate d WITH (NOLOCK) Where D.CalendarYear <= 1900 union SELECT D.DimDateID , D.FullDate , D.DateName , D.MonthName , D.CalendarYear , D.CalendarYearMonth , D.Lineage_ID , D.DateCreated , CONVERT(varchar,d.CalendarYear) as DisplayCalendarYear , d.CalendarYearMonth as DisplayCalendarYearMonth FROM DAL_SEC.dbo.tblDimDate d WITH (NOLOCK) Where D.CalendarYear > 1900
'
SET @vchFullSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; --PRINT @vchFullSQL EXEC (@vchFullSQL)
